titleStmt.title: The sinner impleaded in his own court. Wherein are represented the great discouragements from sinning, which the sinner receiveth from sin it selfe. / By Tho: Pierce rector of Brington in Northamptonshire.
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Norton for Richard Royston,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
